radiographic_examinations.findings: Left ventricular end-diastolic diameter 49 mm, left atrial diameter 40 mm, right atrial diameter 44 mm, right ventricular diameter 37 mm, left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) 33%, no atrial mechanical contraction, absence of a' at the mitral valve annulus.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Double lower-limb arterial computed tomography (CT) angiography
radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffuse embolus and stenosis of both the left iliac artery and right femoral artery, occlusion of the left popliteal artery.
No stenosis in the coronary artery, thrombosis in the left atrial appendage.
